00001 /*
00002  * qport.c
00003  *
00004  *  Created on: 2009-04-23
00005  *      Author: Jean-Lou Dupont
00006  *
00007  *  Inter-thread communication through ``qpipe.c``
00008  *
00009  *  QPORT_CLIENT  corresponds to the direction Client side
00010  *  QPORT_SERVER  corresponds to the direction Server side
00011  *
00012  */
00013 
00014 #include "../includes/helpers.h"
00015 #include "../includes/qport.h"
00016 
00017 
00018 /**
00019  * Initializes a context
00020  *
00021  * The qpipe must be initialized prior.
00022  */
00023 qport_context *qport_init(qpipe *qp, qport port) {
00024         DEBUG_LOG_NULL_PTR(qp, LOG_ERR, "qport_init [null qp]");
00025 
00026         qport_context *tmp;
00027 
00028         tmp = malloc( sizeof(qport_context));
00029         if (NULL!=tmp) {
00030                 tmp->pipe = qp;
00031                 tmp->port = port;
00032         }
00033 
00034         return tmp;
00035 }// init
00036 
00037 /**
00038  * Sends through a port
00039  */
00040 int qport_send(qport_context *qpc, void *msg) {
00041         DEBUG_LOG_NULL_PTR(qpc, LOG_ERR, "qport_send [null qpc]");
00042         DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG, "qport_send: BEGIN, context[%u]", qpc );
00043 
00044         int result;
00045 
00046         switch( qpc->port ) {
00047 
00048                 // Client_to_server
00049         case QPORT_CLIENT:
00050                 result = qpipe_send_to_server(qpc->pipe, msg);
00051                 break;
00052 
00053                 // Server to Client
00054         case QPORT_SERVER:
00055                 result = qpipe_send_to_client(qpc->pipe, msg);
00056                 break;
00057 
00058         default:
00059                 DEBUG_LOG(LOG_ERR, "qport_send: invalid port");
00060                 break;
00061         }
00062 
00063         DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG, "qport_send: END" );
00064         return result;
00065 }// send
00066 
00067 /**
00068  * Receives through a port
00069  */
00070 void *qport_receive(qport_context *qpc) {
00071         DEBUG_LOG_NULL_PTR(qpc, LOG_ERR, "qport_receive [null qpc]");
00072         DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG, "qport_receive: BEGIN, context[%u]", qpc );
00073 
00074         void *result;
00075 
00076         switch(qpc->port) {
00077 
00078                 // Client to Server
00079         case QPORT_CLIENT:
00080                 result = qpipe_receive_from_server(qpc->pipe);
00081                 break;
00082 
00083                 // Server to Client
00084         case QPORT_SERVER:
00085                 result = qpipe_receive_from_client(qpc->pipe);
00086                 break;
00087 
00088         default:
00089                 DEBUG_LOG(LOG_ERR, "qport_receive: invalid port");
00090                 break;
00091         }
00092 
00093         DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG, "qport_receive: END" );
00094         return result;
00095 }// receive
